verses.verse: And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> that which was evil <S%H7451><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, when Ehud <S%H164><s%> was dead <S%H4191><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> sold <S%H4376><s%> them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Jabin <S%H2985><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>, that reigned <S%H4427><s%> in Hazor <S%H2674><s%>; the captain <S%H8269><s%> of whose host <S%H6635><s%> was Sisera <S%H5516><s%>, who lived <S%H3427><s%> in Harosheth <S%H2800><s%> of the Nations <S%H1471><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> cried <S%H6817><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: for he had nine <S%H8672><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> chariots <S%H7393><s%> of iron <S%H1270><s%>; and twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> he mightily <S%H2394><s%> oppressed <S%H3905><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.
Now Deborah <S%H1683><s%>, a prophetess <S%H5031><s%>, the wife <S%H802><s%> of Lappidoth <S%H3941><s%>, she judged <S%H8199><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> at that time <S%H6256><s%>.

And she lived <S%H3427><s%> under the palm-tree <S%H8560><s%> of Deborah <S%H1683><s%> between Ramah <S%H7414><s%> and Beth-el <S%H1008><s%> in the hill-country <S%H2022><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%>: and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> came up <S%H5927><s%> to her for judgment <S%H4941><s%>.

And she sent <S%H7971><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> Barak <S%H1301><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Abinoam <S%H42><s%> out of Kedesh-naphtali <S%H6943><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H3068><s%>, Has not Jehovah, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, commanded <S%H6680><s%>, saying <S%H3212><s%>, Go and draw <S%H4900><s%> unto mountain <S%H2022><s%> Tabor <S%H8396><s%>, and take <S%H3947><s%> with you ten <S%H6235><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men <S%H376><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Naphtali <S%H5321><s%> and of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zebulun <S%H2074><s%>?

And I will draw <S%H4900><s%> unto you <S%H5158><s%>, to the river Kishon <S%H7028><s%>, Sisera <S%H5516><s%>, the captain <S%H8269><s%> of Jabin <S%H2985><s%>'s army <S%H6635><s%>, with his chariots <S%H7393><s%> and his multitude <S%H1995><s%>; and I will deliver <S%H5414><s%> him into your hand <S%H3027><s%>.
And Barak <S%H1301><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto her <S%H3212><s%>, If you will go with me <S%H1980><s%>, then I will go; but if you will not go <S%H3212><s%> with me <S%H3212><s%>, I will not go.

And she said <S%H559><s%>, I will surely <S%H1980><s%> go <S%H3212><s%> with you <S%H657><s%>: nevertheless, the journey <S%H1870><s%> that you take <S%H1980><s%> shall not be for your honor <S%H8597><s%>; for Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will sell <S%H4376><s%> Sisera <S%H5516><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of a woman <S%H802><s%>. And Deborah <S%H1683><s%> arose <S%H6965><s%>, and went <S%H3212><s%> with Barak <S%H1301><s%> to Kedesh <S%H6943><s%>.

And Barak <S%H1301><s%> called <S%H2199><s%> Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> and Naphtali <S%H5321><s%> together to Kedesh <S%H6943><s%>; and there went up <S%H5927><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men <S%H376><s%> at his feet <S%H7272><s%>: and Deborah <S%H1683><s%> went up with him <S%H5927><s%>.

Now Heber <S%H2268><s%> the Kenite <S%H7017><s%> had separated <S%H6504><s%> himself from the Kenites <S%H7017><s%>, even from the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hobab <S%H2246><s%> the brother-in <S%H2859><s%>-law of Moses <S%H4872><s%>, and had pitched <S%H5186><s%> his tent <S%H168><s%> as far as the oak <S%H436><s%> in Zaanannim <S%H6815><s%>, which is by Kedesh <S%H6943><s%>.
And they told <S%H5046><s%> Sisera <S%H5516><s%> that Barak <S%H1301><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Abinoam <S%H42><s%> was gone up <S%H5927><s%> to mountain <S%H2022><s%> Tabor <S%H8396><s%>.

And Sisera <S%H5516><s%> gathered together <S%H2199><s%> all his chariots <S%H7393><s%>, even nine <S%H8672><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> chariots <S%H7393><s%> of iron <S%H1270><s%>, and all the people <S%H5971><s%> that were with him <S%H2800><s%>, from Harosheth of the Nations <S%H1471><s%>, unto the river <S%H5158><s%> Kishon <S%H7028><s%>.

And Deborah <S%H1683><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Barak <S%H1301><s%>, Up <S%H6965><s%>; for this is the day <S%H3117><s%> in which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> has delivered <S%H5414><s%> Sisera <S%H5516><s%> into your hand <S%H3027><s%>; is not Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> gone out <S%H3318><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you <S%H1301><s%>? So Barak went down <S%H3381><s%> from mountain <S%H2022><s%> Tabor <S%H8396><s%>, and ten <S%H6235><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men <S%H376><s%> after him <S%H310><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> defeated <S%H2000><s%> Sisera <S%H5516><s%>, and all his chariots <S%H7393><s%>, and all his host <S%H4264><s%>, with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Barak <S%H1301><s%>; and Sisera <S%H5516><s%> alighted from <S%H3381><s%> his chariot <S%H4818><s%>, and fled away <S%H5127><s%> on his feet <S%H7272><s%>.

But Barak <S%H1301><s%> pursued <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the chariots <S%H7393><s%>, and after the host <S%H4264><s%>, unto Harosheth <S%H2800><s%> of the Nations <S%H1471><s%>: and all the host <S%H4264><s%> of Sisera <S%H5516><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> by the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%>; there was not a man <S%H259><s%> left <S%H7604><s%>.

But Sisera <S%H5516><s%> fled away <S%H5127><s%> on his feet <S%H7272><s%> to the tent <S%H168><s%> of Jael <S%H3278><s%> the wife <S%H802><s%> of Heber <S%H2268><s%> the Kenite <S%H7017><s%>; for there was peace <S%H7965><s%> between Jabin <S%H2985><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Hazor <S%H2674><s%> and the house <S%H1004><s%> of Heber <S%H2268><s%> the Kenite <S%H7017><s%>.

And Jael <S%H3278><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> Sisera <S%H5516><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H5493><s%>, Turn in, my lord <S%H113><s%>, turn in <S%H5493><s%> to me <S%H3372><s%>; fear not <S%H5493><s%>. And he turned in unto her into the tent <S%H168><s%>, and she covered <S%H3680><s%> him with a rug <S%H8063><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto her <S%H4592><s%>, Give me, I pray you, a little water <S%H4325><s%> to drink <S%H8248><s%>; for I am thirsty <S%H6770><s%>. And she opened <S%H6605><s%> a bottle <S%H4997><s%> of milk <S%H2461><s%>, and gave him drink <S%H8248><s%>, and covered him <S%H3680><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto her <S%H5975><s%>, Stand in the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%>, and it shall be <S%H376><s%>, when any man does come <S%H935><s%> and inquire <S%H7592><s%> of you <S%H559><s%>, and say, Is there <S%H3426><s%> any man <S%H376><s%> here <S%H3426><s%>? that you shall say <S%H559><s%>, No.

Then Jael <S%H3278><s%> Heber <S%H2268><s%>'s wife <S%H802><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> a tent <S%H168><s%> - pin <S%H3489><s%>, and took <S%H7760><s%> a hammer <S%H4718><s%> in her hand <S%H3027><s%>, and went <S%H935><s%> softly <S%H3814><s%> unto him <S%H8628><s%>, and struck the pin <S%H3489><s%> into his temples <S%H7541><s%>, and it pierced through into <S%H6795><s%> the ground <S%H776><s%>; for he was in a deep sleep <S%H7290><s%>; so he swooned <S%H5774><s%> and died <S%H4191><s%>.

And <S%H1301><s%>, behold, as Barak pursued <S%H7291><s%> Sisera <S%H5516><s%>, Jael <S%H3278><s%> came out <S%H3318><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> him <S%H559><s%>, and said unto him <S%H3212><s%>, Come, and I will show <S%H7200><s%> you the man <S%H376><s%> whom you seek <S%H1245><s%>. And he came <S%H935><s%> unto her <S%H5516><s%>; and, behold, Sisera lay <S%H5307><s%> dead <S%H4191><s%>, and the tent-pin <S%H3489><s%> was in his temples <S%H7541><s%>.

So God <S%H430><s%> subdued <S%H3665><s%> on that day <S%H3117><s%> Jabin <S%H2985><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> prevailed <S%H7186><s%> more <S%H3212><s%> and more against Jabin <S%H2985><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>, until they had destroyed <S%H3772><s%> Jabin <S%H2985><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>.
